languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, у меня есть для вас особые новости, поступившие от соглядатаев династии. Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар, по слухам, намеревается посетить Футфол. Туда же стягиваются реквизированные им для военных нужд корабли Имперского флота. Также нам доносят о неких секретных посланиях, доставленных в столичные миры Чорда и Винтерскейлов. Возможно, призыв Лорд-инквизитора погасит разгорающийся между этими династиями конфликт. Их суда все чаще ввязываются в стычки, встречаясь в нейтральных системах. Не сомневаюсь, что Ее Светлость Чорда попытается привлечь Лорд-инквизитора на свою сторону".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, у меня есть для вас особые новости, поступившие от соглядатаев династии. Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар, по слухам, намеревается посетить Футфол. Туда же стягиваются реквизированные им для военных нужд корабли Имперского Флота. Также нам доносят о неких секретных посланиях, доставленных в столичные миры Чорда и Винтерскейлов. Возможно, призыв Лорд-инквизитора погасит разгорающийся между этими династиями конфликт. Их суда все чаще ввязываются в стычки, встречаясь в нейтральных системах. Не сомневаюсь, что Ее Светлость Чорда попытается привлечь Лорд-инквизитора на свою сторону".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, у меня есть для вас особые новости, поступившие от соглядатаев династии. Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар, по слухам, намеревается посетить Футфол. languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, des nouvelles particulièrement importantes nous sont parvenues de notre réseau de renseignements. Le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar aurait l'intention de se rendre à Castel. Un certain nombre de vaisseaux de la Marine Impériale ont été réquisitionnés par le seigneur Calcazar et font également route vers Castel. De plus, nous avons reçu confirmation que des messages secrets ont été envoyés sur les mondes capitales des maisons Chorda et Winterscale. L'appel aux armes du seigneur inquisiteur pourrait étouffer le conflit qui couve entre les deux dynasties. Nous assistons à un nombre croissant d'escarmouches entre leurs vaisseaux dans les systèmes neutres. Il ne fait aucun doute que dame Chorda tentera de rallier le seigneur inquisiteur à sa cause. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. languages.text: “大人，家族的情报网得到了非常重要的情报。据称，大审判官卡尔卡扎正打算造访落脚港。帝国海军部分舰船已经被卡尔卡扎大人临时征用，这些舰船目前正在紧急赶往落脚港。此外，我们还收到了报告，说大审判官大人向库尔达家族与温特斯凯尔家族的首都世界送去了密信。大审判官大人的动员号召，或许会平息这两个王朝正在酝酿的冲突。我们留意到，这两个家族在中立星系爆发的小规模冲突越来越频繁，库尔达女士想必打算说服大审判官大人站在她这边。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."

traits.locale_text: “大人，家族的情报网得到了非常重要的情报。据称，卡尔卡扎审判长正打算造访落脚港。帝国海军部分舰船已经被卡尔卡扎大人临时征用，这些舰船目前正在紧急赶往落脚港。此外，我们还收到了报告，说审判长大人向库尔达家族与温特斯凯尔家族的首都世界送去了密信。审判长大人的动员号召，或许会平息这两个王朝正在酝酿的冲突。我们留意到，这两个家族在中立星系爆发的小规模冲突越来越频繁，库尔达女士想必打算说服审判长大人站在她这边。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、当家の情報網から重要な知らせが入りました。ロード・インクィジターであるカルカサル卿がフットフォールへの訪問を計画しているとの噂です。帝国海軍の船が何隻もカルカサル卿に徴発され、フットフォールに緊急で集結させられています。さらに、チョーダ家とウィンタースケール家の首都惑星に密書が届けられたという報告も受けております。ロード・インクィジターによる招集が、両王朝の間に勃発しつつある対立を鎮める可能性も考えられます。中立星系で両王朝の船同士の小競り合いが増えている状況です。チョーダ様がロード・インクィジターを味方につけようとするのは間違いないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."

languages.text: "Lord Captain, eine besonders wichtige Nachricht vom Spionagenetzwerk des Hauses ist eingegangen. Es geht das Gerücht um, dass Großinquisitor Calcazar plant, Footfall einen Besuch abzustatten. Er soll mehrere Schiffe der imperialen Kriegsflotte beschlagnahmt haben und diese ebenfalls nach Footfall mitbringen. Außerdem erhielten wir Berichte, dass Geheimbotschaften an die Hauptwelten der Häuser Chorda und Winterzunder übermittelt wurden. Es ist möglich, dass der Ruf zu den Waffen durch den Großinquisitor den schwelenden Konflikt zwischen den beiden Dynastien beilegt. Wir beobachten eine vermehrte Anzahl von Scharmützeln, die in neutralen System zwischen deren Schiffen ausgetragen werden. Ich zweifle nicht daran, dass Ihre Ladyschaft Chorda versuchen wird, den Großinquisitor auf ihre Seite zu ziehen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."

Ich zweifle nicht daran, dass Ihre Ladyschaft Chorda versuchen wird, den Großinquisitor auf ihre Seite zu ziehen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, nuestra red de inteligencia ha recibido noticias de particular relevancia. Se rumorea que el lord inquisidor Calcazar planea una visita a Paso. Varios navíos de la Armada Imperial han sido requisados por lord Calcazar y se dirigen al planeta. Además, nos han informado de que se han enviado mensajes secretos a los mundos capitales de las casas Chorda y Winterscale. Es posible que la llamada a las armas del lord inquisidor ponga fin al conflicto inminente entre ambas dinastías. Se ha producido un aumento en el número de escaramuzas entre sus naves en sistemas neutrales. No me cabe ninguna duda de que lady Chorda intentará persuadir al lord inquisidor de que respalde su causa».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."

Además, nos han informado de que se han enviado mensajes secretos a los mundos capitales de las casas Chorda y Winterscale. Es posible que la llamada a las armas del lord inquisidor ponga fin al conflicto inminente entre ambas dinastías. Se ha producido un aumento en el número de escaramuzas entre sus naves en sistemas neutrales. No me cabe ninguna duda de que lady Chorda intentará persuadir al lord inquisidor de que respalde su causa».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, hanenin istihbarat ağından özellikle önem taşıyan bazı haberler ulaştı. Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın Binliman'ı ziyaret etme planları olduğu söyleniyor. Lord Calcazar'ın komuta ettiği çok sayıda İmparatorluk Donanması gemisi de Binliman çevresinde toplanıyor. Dahası, bu gizli mesajların Chorda ve Winterscale Hanelerinin başdünyalarına iletildiğine dair raporlar elimize geçti. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun askerî güç konuşlandırması, iki hanedanlık arasındaki artan gerilimi daha da tırmandırabilir. Tarafların gemilerinin tarafsız sistemlerde sık sık çatışmaya girmeye başladığını gözlemlemekteyiz. Leydi Chorda Hazretleri'nin Lord Engizisyoncu'yu kendi tarafına çekmeye çalışacağına hiç şüphem yok."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, news of particular import has come from the house's intelligence network. Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is rumoured to be planning a visit to Footfall. A number of Imperial Navy ships were commandeered by Lord Calcazar and they are also being scrambled to Footfall. Furthermore, we have received reports claiming that secret messages were delivered to the capital worlds of Houses Chorda and Winterscale. It is possible that the Lord Inquisitor's call to arms may smother the conflict that is brewing between the two dynasties. We are seeing an increasing number of skirmishes between their ships in neutral systems. I do not doubt that Her Ladyship Chorda will attempt to sway the Lord Inquisitor to her side."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, hanenin istihbarat ağından özellikle önem taşıyan bazı haberler ulaştı. Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar'ın Binliman'ı ziyaret etme planları olduğu söyleniyor. Lord Calcazar tarafından komuta edilen çok sayıda İmparatorluk Donanması gemisi de Binliman çevresine yayılmakta. Dahası, bu gizli mesajların Chorda ve Winterscale Hanelerinin başdünyalarına iletildiğine dair raporlar elimize geçti. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun askerî güç konuşlaması, iki hanedanlık arasındaki artan gerilimi daha da karmaşık hâle getirebilir. Tarafların gemilerinin tarafsız sistemlerde sık sık çatışmaya girmeye başladığını gözlemlemekteyiz. Leydi Chorda'nın Lord Engizisyoncu'yu kendi tarafına çekmeye çalışacağına hiç şüphem yok."
